channel.title: Amir Rimer Dot Com Podcast: Website Flipping | Outsourcing | Blogging | Passive Income | Online Business
channel.itunes:summary: Through my content you will discover how to create websites for huge profits. You will also discover how to maximize your life and business to their full potential. My name is Amir Rimer, and I live in Israel. I am making a full time income online as a website flipper, website owner, blogger, and an affiliate marketer. I am also a school teacher.
channel.itunes:author: Amir Rimer: Website Flipper, Site Owner, Affiliate Marketer

item.title: Amirrimer.com 092: Learn How To Build And Sell Blogs In 4 Hours – Insert PLR Content To Your Blog
item.dc:creator: Amir Rimer
item.description: Discussed Websites: Wikipedia (Information About PLR conent) The Niche Goldmine (Valid Link) The ‘F’ Guild Resell Rights Fortune (Valid Link) Need More Options: Master Resell Rights – The great thing about buying resell rights packages from membership sites is that in many times those membership sites give you access to their past packages. Meaning, after [...]
item.content:encoded:
Discussed Websites:

Wikipedia (Information About PLR conent)

The Niche Goldmine (Valid Link)

The ‘F’ Guild

Resell Rights Fortune (Valid Link)

Need More Options:

Master Resell Rights – The great thing about buying resell rights packages from membership sites is that in many times those membership sites give you access to their past packages. Meaning, after you sign up for their service, you don’t only get access to the current month’s content, but also to past months content, so you can actually get access to hundreds or thousands of products for one single payment. The great thing about staying a member is that you always get the latest resell rights packages that hit the market. Some membership sites charge $197 per month or more for access, but some, like the Master Resell Rights site, have amazing packages, yet charge much less.

Master-Resell-Rights – This site has amazing resell rights packages, and sometimes you even get bonus packages inside the packages you purchase. The price of the packages in my opinion is a little bit high, so I usually only buy rare packages on this site when I can’t find those rare pacakges anywhere else.

Tradebit – I understand that some people will not want to buy resell rights packages from a membership site which bills them monthly, but instead prefer to be billed per every package they buy. One of the best solutions for this is to buy a resell right package from a site like Tradebit. In this site you will find the most sought after resell rights packages for the lowest prices online.

Two More?

Unselfish Marketer, Platinum Resell Rights

item.itunes:summary:

The great thing about staying a member is that you always get the latest resell rights packages that hit the market. Some membership sites charge $197 per month or more for access, but some, like the Master Resell Rights site, have amazing packages, yet charge much less.
Master-Resell-Rights – This site has amazing resell rights packages, and sometimes you even get bonus packages inside the packages you purchase. The price of the packages in my opinion is a little bit high, so I usually only buy rare packages on this site when I can’t find those rare pacakges anywhere else.
Tradebit - I understand that some people will not want to buy resell rights packages from a membership site which bills them monthly, but instead prefer to be billed per every package they buy. One of the best solutions for this is to buy a resell right package from a site like Tradebit. In this site you will find the most sought after resell rights packages for the lowest prices online.
